Electrical Engineer

Posted: 2025-10-17

Expires: 2025-10-31

Active
Lucky and Yunus Energy is looking for a skilled Electrical Engineer with 3–5 years of hands-on experience in electrical systems and maintenance. If you're passionate about power systems, thrive in dynamic environments, and are ready to take ownership of critical electrical infrastructure Please share your resume at at hr@luckyenergy.net or share in your circle Key Responsibilities: Perform maintenance and troubleshooting of 11kV and 400V systems, including transformers, switchgear, motors, and generators. Lead and supervise electrical maintenance teams for routine, preventive, and corrective activities. Conduct fault diagnosis, root cause analysis (RCA), and implement effective corrective measures. Maintain and update electrical drawings; create or modify layouts using AutoCAD or MS Visio. Manage and maintain UPS systems, VFDs, soft starters, and inverters. Configure and test protection relays, ensuring system reliability and compliance with safety standards. Ensure adherence to electrical safety and HSE protocols during all maintenance and operational activities. Prepare technical reports, support system upgrades, and assist in load management and shedding systems. Preferred Skills: Good grip of MS Excel and MS Office Familiarity with gas and diesel engine gensets at LV/MV levels. Strong ability to read, interpret, and design single-line diagrams and control schematics. Proficiency in ETAP for system analysis and simulation will be a plus.
📍 Karachi#Electrical Engineer🧳 Experienced Required
